SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api

Interface IExecutor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExecutorSpigot
public interface IExecutor
Represents an interface that allows scheduling (a)sync tasks.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • scheduleOnMainThread

      <T> CompletableFuture<T> scheduleOnMainThread(Supplier<T> supplier)
      Schedules a task to be run on the main thread.
      Parameters:
      supplier - A function returning the value to be used to complete the returned IMainThreadExecutor.
      Returns:
      The result of the action.

    • runOnMainThread

      default <T> CompletableFuture<T> runOnMainThread(Supplier<T> supplier)
      Ensures a supplier is run on the main thread.

      When called from the main thread, it will be executed immediately. When called from another thread, the supplier is scheduled to run on the next tick of the main thread instead.

      Returns:
      The result of the action.

    • runOnMainThreadWithResponse

      default CompletableFuture<Void> runOnMainThreadWithResponse(Runnable runnable)
      Ensures a runnable is run on the main thread.

      When called from the main thread, it will be executed immediately. When called from another thread, the supplier is scheduled to run on the next tick of the main thread instead.

      Returns:
      The CompletableFuture that is completed when the runnable has finished running.

    • scheduleOnMainThread

      void scheduleOnMainThread(Runnable runnable)
      Schedules an action to be run on the main thread.

    • runOnMainThread

      default void runOnMainThread(Runnable runnable)
      Ensures a runnable is run on the main thread.

      When called from the main thread, it will be executed immediately. When called from another thread, the supplier is scheduled to run on the next tick of the main thread instead.

      Returns:
      The ID of the task.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The ID of the task.

    • runAsyncRepeated

      int runAsyncRepeated(TimerTask timerTask, long delay, long period)
      Schedules a repeated TimerTask to be run asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      timerTask - The task to run.
      delay - The delay in milliseconds before the task is to be executed.
      period - The time in milliseconds between successive task executions.
      Returns:
      The ID of the task.

    • runAsyncRepeated

      int runAsyncRepeated(Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
      Schedules a repeated Runnable to be run asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The task to run.
      delay - The delay in milliseconds before the task is to be executed.
      period - The time in milliseconds between successive task executions.
      Returns:
      The ID of the task.

      Parameters:

    • isMainThread

      boolean isMainThread(long threadId)
      Checks if a thread is the main thread.
      Parameters:
      threadId - The ID of the thread to compare.
      Returns:
      True if the thread is the main thread.

    • isMainThread

      default boolean isMainThread()
      Checks if the current thread is the main thread.
      Returns:
      True if the current thread is the main thread.

    • assertMainThread

      default void assertMainThread(String message)
      Asserts that this method was called from the main thread. See isMainThread().
      Parameters:
      message - The error message for the exception.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - When called from any thread that is not that main thread.

    • assertMainThread
